duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver patients' meals directly to the patients or other Room Service Associates on the nursing units.
Prepare patients' bedside table for meal delivery.
Measure/record patients' intake information as required by physicians' orders or nursing standards of care.
Respond to questions from patients and/or family members regarding meals and/or menu selection process.
Utilize the At Your Request Room Service Dining computerized scanner to track meals' status.
Retrieve soiled trays from patient rooms and nursing units and return them to the dish room.
Inspect trays for patients' belongings, medical devices, or medications. Assist patients in their rooms with completion of their menus if needed.
Visit patients as necessary when a change has been made in a patient's meal selection. Allow patient input into revision of the menu as appropriate.
Prepare floor stock sheets according to established par levels. Gather, deliver, and put away floor supplies in the nursing units kitchen. Rotate stock and discard outdated perishables.

Mix tube/special feedings according to item specific directions. Portion and label tube/special feedings/supplements accurately. Maintain the clean and sanitary condition of the formulary room and equipment. Inventory supplements and formulary supplies in the store room, prepare order list as necessary.
